cu.explanation_en: Setting the MAC log level to an invalid value will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper MAC layer debugging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the absolute frequency SSB to zero will invalidate the SSB frequency configuration and prevent proper synchronization signal transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 絕對頻率設定為零會使 SSB 頻率配置無效，並阻止正確的同步信號傳輸。
